data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Head-Invo-Item'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_HEADINV_ITM
  as select from ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_HEAD_RPR as Header
    inner join   ZETR_DDL_C_EXPORT_INVH  as invh on Header.filen = invh.FileExportNumber
   /* inner join   zetr_ddl_c_export_invi  as invi on  invh.FileExportNumber = invi.filen
                                                 and invh.BillingDocument  = invi.vbeln*/
{
  key Header.filen,
  key invh.BillingDocument,
      Header.expty,
      Header.expty_txt,
      Header.bukrs,
      Header.bukrs_txt,
      Header.descr,
      Header.bldat,
      Header.extco,
      Header.extco_txt,
      Header.extrg,
      Header.desco,
      Header.desco_txt,
      Header.desrg,
      Header.pymty,
      Header.pymty_txt,
      Header.trnty,
      Header.trnty_txt,
      Header.cuscd,
      Header.cuscd_txt,
      Header.cofrp,
      Header.cusof,
      Header.cusof_txt,
      Header.sfrrp,
      Header.shpfr,
      Header.shpfr_txt,
      Header.bfrrp,
      Header.brofr,
      Header.brofr_txt,
      Header.extfn,
      Header.rexdt,
      Header.cedno,
      Header.ceddt,
      Header.shpdt,
      Header.shpno,
      Header.extdt,
      Header.desdt,
      Header.nopck,
      Header.clsed,
      Header.fldel,
      Header.chind,
      Header.bankl,
      Header.iban,
      Header.BankName,
      Header.BankBranch,
      Header.kunrg,
      Header.kunrg_txt,
      Header.inc01,
      Header.inc02,
      Header.lcnum,
      Header.plaka,
      Header.snrkp,
      Header.ucsno,
      Header.ucstr,
      Header.hzrtr,
      Header.beyts,
      Header.beysa,
      Header.beyty,
      Header.hatbl,
      Header.gemia,
      Header.sefno,
      Header.sbeyt,
      Header.bolnumber,
      Header.brgew,
      Header.ntgew,
      Header.gewei,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure : 'gewei'
      Header.volum,
      Header.voleh,
      Header.erdat,
      Header.ernam,
      Header.erzet,
      Header.aedat,
      Header.aezet,
      Header.aenam,
      Header.reffn,
      Header.incno,
      invh.FileExportNumber,
      invh.CompanyCode,
      invh.CompanyCodeName,
      invh.BillingDocumentType,
      invh.BillingDocumentTypeName,
      invh.SalesOrganization,
      invh.SalesOrganizationName,
      invh.DistributionChannel,
      invh.DistributionChannelName,
      invh.Division,
      invh.DivisionName,
      invh.PayerParty,
      invh.PayerPartyName,
      invh.SoldToParty,
      invh.SoldToPartyName,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      invh.TotalNetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      invh.TotalTaxAmount,
      invh.TransactionCurrency,
      invh.BillingDocumentDate,
      invh.DocumentReferenceID,
      invh.CustomerPaymentTerms,
      invh.CustomerPaymentTermsName,
      invh.IncotermsClassification,
      invh.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      invh.IncotermsVersion,
      invh.CreationDate,
      invh.CreationTime,
      invh.CreatedByUser,
      invh.AccountingTransferStatus,
      invh.AccountingTransferStatusText
      /*,
      invi.BillingDocumentItem,
      invi.HigherLevelItem,
      invi.HigherLvlItmOfBatSpltItm,
      invi.Product,
      invi.BillingDocumentItemText,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'BillingQuantityUnit'
      invi.BillingQuantity,
      invi.BillingQuantityUnit,

      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      invi.NetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      invi.TaxAmount,
      invi.Batch,
      invi.Plant,
      invi.PlantName,
      invi.StorageLocation,
      invi.StorageLocationName,
      invi.ShippingPoint,
      invi.ShippingPointName,
      invi.SalesDocument,
      invi.SalesDocumentItem,
      invi.ReferenceSDDocument,
      invi.ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      invi.kunwe,
      invi.namwe*/
}
